channel.title: Runetimatum 317 - Server
channel.description:
[SIZE=5]Project Time: 1 month.[/SIZE] [SIZE=5]Download: [url=http://up.ht/1gdutkm]http://up.ht/1gdutkm[/url][/SIZE] [SIZE=5]Project Name: Runetimatum[/SIZE] [SIZE=5]Original Source: Delta (Heavily modified with completely refurbished systems like combat, food, shops, etc)[/SIZE] [SIZE=5]Server type: PKing w/ Economy [/SIZE]
This server uses the ::item command. Unlike most servers, the ::item command costs money to "spawn" items. Rares cannot be spawned by ::item. (Ags, Phats, DFS, Etc)
[SIZE=1]Example 1:[/SIZE] [SIZE=1]::item 4151 1[/SIZE] [SIZE=1]You just purchased abyssal whip for 3000000.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=1]Example 2: [/SIZE] [SIZE=1]::item 4151 2 (Buys 2 whips)[/SIZE] [SIZE=1]You just purchased abyssal whip for 6000000.[/SIZE]
[U][B]Features List:[/B][/U]
[ul][*][B][U]Skillcape Emotes[/U][/B] [*][B][U]God Wars Dungeon Map[/U][/B] [*][B][U]All God Wars gods[/U][/B] [*][B][U]PK Point Shop[/U][/B] [*][B][U]Donator Point Shop[/U][/B] [*][B][U]PvP Rewards added onto kills (Ancient statuette, Barrows, Vestas, Random Rune, etc)[/U][/B] [*][B][U]Supply Shop with unlimited stock of common items. (Fire Cape, Etc)[/U][/B] [*][B][U]Players can create their own CUSTOM Shops. (Full-proof)[/U][/B] [*][B][U]Runescape Spirit Shield effects (Unlike most servers that just put in shields with high def, I coded FULL RS EFFECTS)[/U][/B] [*][B][U]Fully working DFS Operate option better than PI dfs.[/U][/B] [*][B][U]Many items from runescape cache, dungeoneering items, balmung, etc.[/U][/B] [*][B][U]Specially made buttons placed into emote tab.[/U][/B] [*][B][U]Fully working skillcape emotes.[/U][/B] [*][B][U]Many NPC Skins updated (525 Kalphite, 525 Dragons, etc)[/U][/B] [*][B][U]Pest Control[/U][/B] [*][B][U]Custom Donator Options[/U][/B] [*][B][U]Chaotic Items[/U][/B] [*][B][U]All PvP Armor/Weps (Statius,Vesta, etc)[/U][/B] [*][B][U]10x Hits[/U][/B] [*][B][U]Fully working Veng/Veng Other/Energy Transfer/Spellbook Swap[/U][/B] [*][B][U]All Skills work w/ custom construction. (Construction is turned off but can be turned on.)[/U][/B] [*][B][U]Many many features besides that.[/U][/B][/ul] [B][U]Pictures:[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i67.servimg.com/u/f67/15/37/67/34/pic0_b10.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.servimg.com/u/f67/15/37/67/34/pic1_b11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.servimg.com/u/f67/15/37/67/34/pic2_b11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.servimg.com/u/f67/15/37/67/34/pic3_b11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.servimg.com/u/f67/15/37/67/34/pic4_b11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.servimg.com/u/f67/15/37/67/34/pic5_b11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.servimg.com/u/f67/15/37/67/34/pic6_b11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.servimg.com/u/f67/15/37/67/34/pic7_b11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.servimg.com/u/f67/15/37/67/34/pic8_b11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.servimg.com/u/f67/15/37/67/34/pic9_b11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.servimg.com/u/f67/15/37/67/34/pic10_11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.servimg.com/u/f67/15/37/67/34/pic11_11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.servimg.com/u/f67/15/37/67/34/pic12_11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.servimg.com/u/f67/15/37/67/34/pic13_11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.servimg.com/u/f67/15/37/67/34/pic14_11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.servimg.com/u/f67/15/37/67/34/pic15_11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.servimg.com/u/f67/15/37/67/34/pic16_11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.servimg.com/u/f67/15/37/67/34/pic17_11.jpg[/img]

item.title: Runetimatum 317 - Server
item.dc:creator: @uppittt uppittt
item.description:
@uppittt wrote:

[SIZE=5]Project Time: 1 month.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]Download: http://up.ht/1gdutkm[/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]Project Name: Runetimatum[/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]Original Source: Delta (Heavily modified with completely refurbished systems like combat, food, shops, etc)[/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]Server type: PKing w/ Economy [/SIZE]

This server uses the ::item command.
Unlike most servers, the ::item command costs money to “spawn” items.
Rares cannot be spawned by ::item. (Ags, Phats, DFS, Etc)

[SIZE=1]Example 1:[/SIZE]
[SIZE=1]::item 4151 1[/SIZE]
[SIZE=1]You just purchased abyssal whip for 3000000.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=1]Example 2: [/SIZE]
[SIZE=1]::item 4151 2 (Buys 2 whips)[/SIZE]
[SIZE=1]You just purchased abyssal whip for 6000000.[/SIZE]

[U][B]Features List:[/B][/U]

[ul][][B][U]Skillcape Emotes[/U][/B]
[][B][U]God Wars Dungeon Map[/U][/B]
[][B][U]All God Wars gods[/U][/B]
[][B][U]PK Point Shop[/U][/B]
[][B][U]Donator Point Shop[/U][/B]
[][B][U]PvP Rewards added onto kills (Ancient statuette, Barrows, Vestas, Random Rune, etc)[/U][/B]
[][B][U]Supply Shop with unlimited stock of common items. (Fire Cape, Etc)[/U][/B]
[][B][U]Players can create their own CUSTOM Shops. (Full-proof)[/U][/B]
[][B][U]Runescape Spirit Shield effects (Unlike most servers that just put in shields with high def, I coded FULL RS EFFECTS)[/U][/B]
[][B][U]Fully working DFS Operate option better than PI dfs.[/U][/B]
[][B][U]Many items from runescape cache, dungeoneering items, balmung, etc.[/U][/B]
[][B][U]Specially made buttons placed into emote tab.[/U][/B]
[][B][U]Fully working skillcape emotes.[/U][/B]
[][B][U]Many NPC Skins updated (525 Kalphite, 525 Dragons, etc)[/U][/B]
[][B][U]Pest Control[/U][/B]
[][B][U]Custom Donator Options[/U][/B]
[][B][U]Chaotic Items[/U][/B]
[][B][U]All PvP Armor/Weps (Statius,Vesta, etc)[/U][/B]
[][B][U]10x Hits[/U][/B]
[][B][U]Fully working Veng/Veng Other/Energy Transfer/Spellbook Swap[/U][/B]
[][B][U]All Skills work w/ custom construction. (Construction is turned off but can be turned on.)[/U][/B]
[][B][U]Many many features besides that.[/U][/B][/ul]
[B][U]Pictures:[/U][/B]

















Read full topic
